languages.text: Тела эльдаров порублены с чрезвычайной жестокостью, судя по характеру ран — неким силовым оружием. От пролитой крови почва под телами стала ржаво-бурого цвета.

The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.
languages.original_text: Тела эльдаров порублены с чрезвычайной жестокостью, судя по характеру ран — неким силовым оружием. От пролитой крови почва под телами стала ржаво-бурого цвета.

traits.locale_text: The bodies of the Aeldari were hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

languages.text: 艾达灵族的尸体被残忍地剁成了肉泥。尸体上的伤口表明，他们是被某种能量武器杀害的，尸体下面的土壤已经浸透了鲜血，变成了铁锈般的棕色。
languages.original_text: The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

traits.locale_text: 艾达灵族的尸体被残忍地剁成了肉泥。尸体上的伤口表明，他们是被某种能量武器杀害的，尸体下面的土壤已经浸透了鲜血，变成了铁锈般的棕色。

languages.text: Die Leichen der Aeldari wurden mit extremer Brutalität in Stücke gehackt. Mit einer Energiewaffe, den Wunden nach zu urteilen. Die Erde unter den Leichen hat sich vom Blut braun gefärbt.
languages.original_text: The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

traits.locale_text: Die Leichen der Aeldari wurden mit extremer Brutalität in Stücke gehackt. Mit einer Energiewaffe, den Wunden nach zu urteilen. Die Erde unter den Leichen hat sich vom Blut braun gefärbt.

languages.text: Los cuerpos de los Aeldari han sido despedazados con una brutalidad extrema. A juzgar por sus heridas, se utilizó algún tipo de arma de energía. La tierra sobre la que yacen los restos ha adquirido un color marrón herrumbroso al mezclarse con la sangre y las vísceras.
languages.original_text: The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

traits.locale_text: Los cuerpos de los Aeldari han sido despedazados con una brutalidad extrema. A juzgar por sus heridas, se utilizó algún tipo de arma de energía. La tierra sobre la que yacen los restos ha adquirido un color marrón herrumbroso al mezclarse con la sangre y las vísceras.

languages.text: Les corps des Aeldaris ont été mis en pièces avec une brutalité extrême. Au vu de leurs blessures, c'est une arme énergétique qui les a tués. Sous les cadavres, le sol taché de sang a pris une couleur brun rouille.
languages.original_text: The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

traits.locale_text: Les corps des Aeldaris ont été mis en pièces avec une brutalité extrême. Au vu de leurs blessures, c'est une arme énergétique qui les a tués. Sous les cadavres, le sol taché de sang a pris une couleur brun rouille.

languages.text: アエルダリの遺体は残忍にも切り刻まれていた。その傷は、ある種のパワーウェポンによるものであることを示している。死体の下の土は血糊で錆びた茶色に変色している。
languages.original_text: The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

traits.locale_text: アエルダリの遺体は残忍にも切り刻まれていた。その傷は、ある種のパワーウェポンによるものであることを示している。死体の下の土は血糊で錆びた茶色に変色している。

languages.text: Aeldari cesetleri, muazzam bir gaddarlıkla parçalarına ayrılmış. Yaraları, bir tür güç silahıyla bu hâle geldiklerine işaret ediyor. Cesetlerinin altındaki toprak, dökülen tüm bu kandan pas rengine dönmüş.
languages.original_text: The bodies of the Aeldari have been hacked to pieces with extreme brutality. Their wounds indicate it was done by a power weapon of some kind. The soil under the bodies has turned a rusty brown from the gore.

traits.locale_text: Aeldari cesetleri, muazzam bir gaddarlıkla parçalarına ayrılmış. Yaraları, bir tür güç silahıyla bu hâle geldiklerine işaret ediyor. Cesetlerinin altındaki toprak, dökülen tüm bu kandan pas rengine dönmüş.
